content:
unable to properly enforce law, due to the fact that this government had only a legislature (law making body) and not an executive branch
	-was dependent on the state governments to enforce these laws, but they were weak
	-these govs weak because they were reelected like every year and they werenâ€™t inclined to make difficult and hard choices

we knew that changes needed to be made but because of the "one-state veto," we couldn't rip
